user_12345.summary: The user is a beginner with a goal to reduce arm fat. Their current fitness level allows for 15-20 minutes of exercise, 4-5 days a week.
User is also feeling stressed and is open to mindfulness techniques.

default_user.summary: User wants to reduce arm fat and has committed to a 5-day-a-week, 30-minute morning exercise plan. The plan includes brisk walking, circuit training, and cardio.

alice.summary: User experienced arm pain and was advised to consult a doctor or physical therapist for diagnosis and treatment recommendations.
User wants to modify arm exercise routine but has ongoing arm pain. Advised to seek medical clearance before proceeding with modifications.

Provided a 30-minute indoor resistance band and bodyweight routine for Mondays as an alternative to walking due to pollution. Routine is beginner-friendly and mindful of previous arm pain, focusing on lower body and core with optional light arm work.
